reviews.text: SEV-1 Alert: “epoch overflow 2038-01-19 03:14:08” triggered critical time_t failure.
reviews.reason_text: Status alert indicating issue, not enforceable action.

reviews.text: All engineers: immediately rollback to build v2.7.3 across all regions using `ci-hotfix.sh`.
reviews.reason_text: Immediate rollback order across regions using specified script.

reviews.text: Mitigation SLA: pipelines must be green within 15 minutes.
reviews.reason_text: SLA specifying green pipelines within time frame.

reviews.text: An epoch-safe patch must be cut and validated by EOD.
reviews.reason_text: Enforceable deadline for cutting and validating a patch.

reviews.text: Create a post-mortem ticket with root-cause analysis and include a regression test explicitly covering `time_t >= INT32_MAX`.
reviews.reason_text: Obligation to create post-mortem ticket with analysis and test.
No exceptions imply universal requirement for verification.
